title: Gamblers Adapt To Prediction Markets
description: The rise of prediction markets is just the latest step of the institutionalization of the gambling world which continues to take professional gamblers away from traditional sports books. Bloomberg’s Ira Boudway has more. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: The rise of prediction markets is just the latest step of the institutionalization of the gambling world which continues to take professional gamblers away from traditional sports books. Bloomberg’s Ira Boudway has more. (Source: Bloomberg)
